data.thought: S30|H|S27|Observatory Phenotype E3: 'Collaborative Canvas'. Multiple users connected to same Observatory session. Each user's cursor/actions visible. Notebook cells are shared state. Thoughtbox mediates: conflict resolution, merge suggestions, synthesis of multiple inputs. Observable: multi-cursor editing, real-time collaboration, AI-mediated merges. Like Google Docs + Jupyter + AI moderator. Use case: pair programming, design sessions, teaching.
